summary:
Blue & Black Re-textured glazedware items.
Re-placer and Non re-placer for your mods included.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#1e84cc]Blue[/color] & [color=#000000]Black[/color] Glazedware Resource

[/size][size=4]2 versions - Re-placer and Non re-placer for your mods.
Both versions included in the file.[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]Choose only 1 version.

May do an update later adding color variations.
[/size][size=4]
